common

Interface ILocalModelAdapter


  • public interface ILocalModelAdapter
    This is the adapter between AlgoCommands and the model. This must be the "A" generic for your ADataPacketAlgoCmds.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPerson(ICommunicate person)
      Adds a person (ICommunicate) to the chatroom, as represented by a set of ICommunicates.
      void appendComponent(java.util.function.Supplier<java.awt.Component> componentFactory)
      Send a Component factory method off to the view; the view should then invoke the supplier and append the result to the view.
      void appendText(java.lang.String text)
      Append some text to the view.
      provided.datapacket.DataPacketAlgo<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void> getDataPacketAlgo()
      Gets the visitor for messages for the user from the model
      ICommunicate getUser()
      Gets the ICommunicate that represents the user in the current group.
      void removePerson(ICommunicate person)
      Removes a person (ICommunicate) from the chatroom, as represented by a set of ICommunicates.

    • Method Detail

      • appendText

        void appendText(java.lang.String text)
        Append some text to the view.
        Parameters:
        text - to append

      • appendComponent

        void appendComponent(java.util.function.Supplier<java.awt.Component> componentFactory)
        Send a Component factory method off to the view; the view should then invoke the supplier and append the result to the view. This message passes a Supplier instead of a Component so that the GUI thread isn't blocked in the model.
        Parameters:
        componentFactory - factory for making a component

        ICommunicate getUser()
